title: Help!
content:
Can anybody help me to identify this beautiful font?

Maria

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020203121im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Typo_3651.jpg)
author: kaktusfirma

comments.content:
Here’s a \* [link](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020203121/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/din-schriften/)\* for DIN.

The serif reminds me of Centennial, but is quite different in some details (one-storey ‘g’).

Hey,

The text is from a beautiful book called "Geschäftsberichte –finest facts & figures" some sort of annual report of 2007 (it says "Grundschrift Compatil Linitype" but it's not this one I think ...)

DIN is one of my favorit, so why didn't I see that? :-)

Maria
